original_text: And the meat of those animals belongs to you. In the same way, the meat of the ribs and the right back leg of the special gifts that you lift up to me also belong to you.
korean_text: 그 고기는 네게 돌릴지니 흔든 가슴과 오른쪽 넓적다리 같이 네게 돌릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: And the meat of those animals belongs to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 동물들의 고기는 너에게 속한다.

sentences.original_text: the meat of the ribs and the right back leg
that you lift up to me
